issue.title: [C++][CI] Configure a build to build and execute the C++ tests with GCC 4.8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8431](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8431). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The gandiva jar nightly build and the manylinux1 wheels are building with GCC 4.8.
We already have the manylinux1 running on each commit but it doesn't exercise the C++ tests

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8431?focusedCommentId=17191781) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I'm not convinced this would be a very good use of our time, since gcc 4.8 is mostly obsolete by now (except for manylinux1, admittedly).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8431?focusedCommentId=17200902) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
I'm fine with closing this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8431?focusedCommentId=17200904) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Sorry, had to reopen to remove the version...
